scripts.test-manual: rimraf test && mkdir -p test && yarn test:js & yarn test:ts
scripts.test:js:jest: cd test && ../app.js js-jest TestJS 'test' n jest y y && cd js-jest && yarn prepare && yarn test
scripts.test:js:karma: cd test && ../app.js js-karma TestJS 'test' n karma y y && cd js-karma && yarn prepare && yarn test
scripts.test:ts:jest: cd test && ../app.js ts-jest TestJS 'test' y jest y y && cd js-jest && yarn prepare && yarn test
scripts.test:ts:karma: cd test && ../app.js ts-karma TestJS 'test' y karma y y && cd js-karma && yarn prepare && yarn test
